titles.title: Tongari Boushi no Memole: Mariel no Housekibako
とんがり帽子のメモル マリエルの宝石箱

anime.description: Marielle is a young girl currently living in a remote house deep in the mountains between Switzerland and France to recover her health. The story is told through the memories of her adventures with Memoru, a tiny alien girl who lives on a nearby island. Her people are gnome-like beings who are stuck on Earth after their spaceship crashed here.

externalentity.identifier: とんがり帽子のメモル#OVA
